meanings.sent1: The festivalgoers enjoyed the music and food at the event.
meanings.sent2: Many festivalgoers gathered in the park for the annual celebration.
meanings.sent3: The festivalgoers wore colorful hats and danced in the sunshine.
meanings.sent4: The streets were filled with festivalgoers like a river flowing with joy.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the happy faces of the festivalgoers.

meanings.sent1: The festivalgoers brought their own instruments to join the parade.
meanings.sent2: Local festivalgoers showcased their talents in the cultural performances.
meanings.sent3: The festivalgoers competed in a friendly pie-eating contest.
meanings.sent4: The spirit of the festivalgoers lit up the night like stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the festivalgoers echoed through the town square.
